channel.title: Chests
channel.description:
Is there a possibility I could get my chest permissions switched from 'Herobrine' to 'Travas'?
Also, there is a locked cobblestone block I'd like removed. And there is also a chest that someone else locked near my house: [399, -63]
Thanks

item.title: Chests
item.dc:creator: @Tom Tom
item.description:
@Tom wrote:

Alright, I’ve unlocked the chests. Have fun.

Read full topic

item.title: Chests
item.dc:creator: @Travas Travas
item.description:
@Travas wrote:

xxx123xxx:

I really don’t see anyone who has the mc name “Herobrine” registered with their forum account tho. There’s an option to search for members via there MC name and one is Daherobrine and the other is Herobrine895

[quote=“Tom, post:15, topic:461644”]I’m gonna need us both to be online at the same time.[/quote]I’m ready right now.

Read full topic

item.title: Chests
item.dc:creator: @Tom Tom
item.description:
@Tom wrote:

I’m gonna need us both to be online at the same time.

item.dc:creator: @xxx123xxx xxx123xxx

I really don’t see anyone who has the mc name “Herobrine” registered with their forum account tho. There’s an option to search for members via there MC name and one is Daherobrine and the other is Herobrine895

item.title: Chests
item.dc:creator: @Travas Travas
item.description:
@Travas wrote:

[quote=“triston001, post:12, topic:461644”][quote author=xxx123xxx link=topic=564591.msg4120597#msg4120597 date=1349667348]

use a cracked client to use your other name, unlock them, then re-lock them as you.

you need multiple forum accounts for that?
[/quote]
no, cracked clients can allow you to enter whatever username u wish, or atleast the one i use. if u go under your settings, you can change the name u use for going on the server, and all he has to do is just enter the server has the name under the chests, unlock those, go back online, change it back to his normal account and re-lock them as himself. i had to do this when i transitioned from triston001 to lustratio001.[/quote]If you read the entire thread, you would see that somone has already taken the name Herobrine, so I am unable to do so.

Read full topic

item.title: Chests
item.dc:creator: @triston001 triston001
item.description:
@triston001 wrote:

[quote=“xxx123xxx, post:8, topic:461644”][quote author=triston001 link=topic=564591.msg4120576#msg4120576 date=1349663396]
use a cracked client to use your other name, unlock them, then re-lock them as you.
[/quote]
you need multiple forum accounts for that?[/quote]
no, cracked clients can allow you to enter whatever username u wish, or atleast the one i use. if u go under your settings, you can change the name u use for going on the server, and all he has to do is just enter the server has the name under the chests, unlock those, go back online, change it back to his normal account and re-lock them as himself. i had to do this when i transitioned from triston001 to lustratio001.

Read full topic

item.title: Chests

item.description:

So I’m guessing it’s impossible to do, Tom?

Read full topic

item.title: Chests
item.dc:creator: @zuppers zuppers
item.description:
@zuppers wrote:

[quote=“Travas, post:3, topic:461644”]I can’t login to Herobrine, someone has taken that name.

Zuppers told me awhile ago on the IRC that it is possible and he’s done it before, but I guess he forgot to do it. :([/quote]Well I think I can do it I’m just not sure.

item.title: Chests
item.dc:creator: @si_force Si Force
item.description:
@si_force wrote:

As far as I know it’s not possible. You’ll have to log on to ‘Herobrine’ and either give Travas permission to open your chests or else remove the LWC lock then re-add them on Travas.

Read full topic
